dmca.title: Poet claims infringement
dmca.body:
I. The identified work is a poem entitled: When I Say, "I am a Christian" copyright 1988 Carol S. Wimmer; record # TX-5-064-953 in the U.S. loc; published in several books and featured on the author's site at www.carolwimmer.com

When I say, "I am a Christian" I'm not shouting, "I've been saved!"
I'm whispering, "I get lost! That's why I chose this way"
When I say, "I am a Christian" I don't speak with human pride
I'm confessing that I stumble
